product_name: Ahnu Elkridge II Waterproof Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: Ahnu Elkridge II waterproof hiking shoes provide eVent(R) waterproof protection, and lightweight construction that offers support and stability for day hikes and lightweight overnight trips. Highly breathable eVent waterproof membranes keep rain and moisture out while setting a high standard for comfort by allowing perspiration to dissipate and vent quickly. Uppers feature a mix of tough, full-grain leather and protective synthetic leather for lasting performance and support. Synthetic mesh linings wick moisture away from feet. Dual-density EVA midsoles offer shock absorption and cushioning; thermoplastic urethane shanks and forefoot plates supply support, torsional rigidity and rock protection. Nonmarking rubber outsoles feature multidirectional lugs for great traction on varying terrain.
short_description: Ahnu Elkridge II waterproof hiking shoes provide eVent(R) waterproof protection, and lightweight construction that offers support and stability for day hikes and lightweight overnight trips.
